OOC: I guessing if your close enough to stab Prebon your close enough for 
this to be legal.

::Koj::

Koj smiles light as he looks at the Sword in his upper left breast plate as 
it leaks alittle. "Is this the limit of your power?" Koj takes his left hand 
up in Eagle Claw style and brings it down of the Flat of the sword 
shattering the in the middle leaving a part in his chest and looks at 
Prebon. Koj takes the Tekno Fang a jumps and spins quickly bring the Fang's 
teeth across Prebon upper chest in a knock back style. ((Attck style that is 
used to knock back your enemy if you think he is to close.)) Seeing the 
incoming attacks for other Maximals Koj fires off his jets in reverse 
getting out of the way of Prebon and the maximal attacks.

::Inu-Yasha::

Inu looks at Prebon troops trying to close to protect there leader or 
something and use his Fire breath to make a Mega Flare fires it to cut them 
off as it hit the earth creates a extremely hot blaze by burning the trees 
trying to cut the other Trainners off from reaching Prebon. (Fire -1 of 3)  
Plasma= 3  Fire=2 Ice=3 lighting=3 Blight=3
